finish-args-flatpak-system-folder-access: Used to fetch the icons of flatpak browsers.
finish-args-unnecessary-xdg-data-flatpak: Used to fetch the icons of flatpak browsers.
finish-args-flatpak-spawn-access: This is needed to fetch flatpak browser information and to run the created Web App from this application.
finish-args-unnecessary-xdg-data-applica: Used to create and delete owned desktop files.
finish-args-flatpak-appdata-folder-acces: Used to create isolated profile folder for flatpak browsers. For some flatpak browsers it's necessary to create a directory in their sandbox for profile isolation. For some browsers it's used to update profile config for a minimal ui.
